tr.td: HALLMARK_PANCREAS_ BETA_CELLS
Genes specifically up-regulated in pancreatic beta cells.
DPP4, LMO2, SRP9, SRP14
HALLMARK_ INFLAMMATORY_ RESPONSE

Genes annotated by the GO term GO:0006954. The immediate defensive reaction to infection or injury caused by chemical or physical agents. The process is characterized by local vasodilation, extravasation of plasma into intercellular spaces and accumulation of white blood cells and macrophages.

AXL, CD55, HAS2, ITGB3, EMP3, IRF7, TNFRSF1B, NFKBIA, EDN1, DCBLD2, ATP2B1, CCL2, SRI, IL18, BST2, ADORA2B, CSF1, TNFAIP6, ADM, ITGA5, CCL7, TLR2, TPBG, HIF1A, PDPN, TAPBP, ABI1, KLF6, NFKB1, SERPINE1, GNAI3, RHOG, CCRL2, SLC7A1, ABCA1, SLC4A4, CDKN1A, GPC3, PVR, PLAUR, IFNGR2, IL18R1, RELA, IL6, P2RY2, EIF2AK2, TIMP1, MMP14, GCH1, LIF, CXCL10, KIF1B

Genes encoding components of blood coagulation system; also up-regulated in platelets.

Genes encoding components of apical junction complex.

HALLMARK_APICAL_ SURFACE
Genes encoding proteins over-represented on the apical surface of epithelial cells, e.g., important for cell polarity (apical area).
SULF2, THY1, HSPB1, DCBLD2, EFNA5, ADAM10, PLAUR, ATP8B1
